auth.title: Authentication
auth.subtitle: System protected with ModSecurity and HashiCorp Vault
securityList: Protection against SQL Injection, XSS, RCE

2fa.notEnabled: 2FA is not enabled for this user
2fa.scanQRMessage: Scan the QR code with your authentication app
2fa.backupCodeSuccess: âœ“ Verification successful with backup code. You have {{remaining}} codes remaining.
2fa.invalidCurrentCode: Incorrect code. Use the current code from your authenticator app.
2fa.protectAccount: Protect your account with two-factor authentication.
2fa.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.):
2fa.enterCurrentCode: Enter your current 2FA code to disable:
2fa.backupCodesGenerated: New codes generated. Check your email.
2fa.enterCodePrompt: Enter the code from your authenticator app
2fa.useBackupCode: Don't have access to your authenticator app?
2fa.qrExpired: QR code has expired. Please generate a new one.

gdpr.title: Data Protection and Privacy
gdpr.subtitle: Exercise your data protection rights under GDPR
gdpr.dataProcessing: Consent to the processing of my data for service provision
gdpr.analytics: Share anonymous data for analysis and service improvement
gdpr.anonymizationDesc: Anonymization will remove all your personally identifiable information (email, name, avatar) but will keep your account functional with an anonymous ID.
anonymizationList: Your account will continue to work
You won't be able to recover your personal data
gdpr.deletionDesc: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. You won't be able to recover your account or information.
deletionList: All your data will be permanently deleted
Your account will cease to exist
gdpr.anonymizeConfirmText: Are you sure you want to anonymize your data? This action:
anonymizeDetails: Will remove your email, username and avatar
Will close all your active sessions
gdpr.accountRemains: Your account will continue to exist with an anonymous ID.
gdpr.deletionWarning: This action will PERMANENTLY DELETE your account and all your data.
gdpr.irreversible: IT IS IRREVERSIBLE. YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO RECOVER YOUR ACCOUNT.
gdpr.anonymizationSuccess: Your data has been successfully anonymized
gdpr.confirmationRequired: Written confirmation is required to delete the account

messages.dataAnonymized: Your data has been anonymized successfully
messages.accountDeleted: Your account and all your data have been permanently deleted
messages.2FASetupSuccess: 2FA activated successfully. Check your email for backup codes.
messages.invalidBackupFormat: Invalid backup code format (must be XXXXX-XXX)
messages.timeSyncIssue: Please check that your authenticator time is synchronized
messages.gatewayTimeout: Service is taking too long. Please try again later.

validation.temporaryEmailNotAllowed: Temporary email addresses are not allowed
validation.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 30 characters
validation.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

players.authRequired: You must be logged in to see other players
players.loadError: Failed to load players. Please try again later.
players.loadErrorProfile: Failed to load player profile. Please try again later.
